harmony, balance, agreement: to carve, to engrave, to inscribe
to be original, creative, inventive, ingenious
to act on, to conduct, to practice, to carry out
all things taken together, when all is said and done
a pavilion, a gazebo, a summerhouse
as much as one can, by all means, kindly
to have a hard time, to have trouble
a trace, a vestige, evidence, tracks
